name: How Many
description:
How Many is a casual game for Android, where the objective is to count all the characters that stay inside the building on the level.

POWERS

Hammer:When you touch the button with the hammer icon you have 3 seconds for touching as many characters as you can. Every character that you touch it's going to be eliminated.

Turtle:When you touch the button with the turtle on it, the time it's going to slow down for 3 seconds

.

This is our first game, is not near good, but we learned a lot, I hope you enjoy it, even if it's just a little.
